snippet: Inside Germany and in Europe at large, some leaders and the general public worry that the Continent is reaching its limits with the migrant crisis.
abstract: German Chancellor Angela Merkel has appeared steadfast in her resolve to have her country welcome hundreds of thousands of migrants from Middle East and Africa; political pressure is building both within country and across Europe for less welcoming policy.
lead_paragraph: Inside Germany and in Europe at large, some leaders and the general public worry that the Continent is reaching its limits with the migrant crisis.

headline.main: Pressure Grows on Merkel as Strain From Refugees Increases
headline.print_headline: Strains of Migrant Crisis Increase the Political Pressure on Germany’s Leader

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
